question: why am i having vaginal pain?
question_content: Lately ive been having pain whenever my husband inserts all the way. we've been together 6 years and i also have a 3 year old. sex never hurt before but we were away from each other for 7 months and i had no intercourse at all would that be why im experiencing pain? we've been having sex for about 2 months now and the pain is still the same

answers.answer_content: Go to your gynocologist or doctor. We won't be much help.
